title: League Displays error
body: Whenever my screensaver activates as league displays, it loads a black screen and says "Failed to load URL : [...] error (-6). Is this happening to anyone else ? Please help me :(        {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Do me a favor and make sure you use the bug report feature in the bottom right-hand corner of the display app to send this over to the dev team. You could also post this down in the [**Bug Report board**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) as well!

I have also found this bug. No idea what to do about it /:

Edit: I fixed it! Just try uninstalling then reinstalling the software :)
Tried it a few times now, and somehow this doesn't work for me. I have sent a bug report and am patiently waiting for it to be patched. Guess I'll wait {{champion:32}}
